function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low level of concern about potential infection transmitted by asymptomatic carriers","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and spread within the population","Mitigation":"Public awareness campaigns, education on asymptomatic transmission, and emphasizing the importance of crowd avoidance","Technologies":"Public health communication platforms, social media, and educational materials","People":"General population","Owner":"Government health organizations and public health institutions"},{"Description":"Challenges in maintaining physical distance in densely-populated cities","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission in densely-populated areas","Mitigation":"Urban planning and design interventions to create more open spaces and reduce population density, public health regulations for crowd control","Technologies":"Urban planning software, population density mapping tools, and public health management systems","People":"Urban planners, city officials, public health authorities","Owner":"Urban development authorities, city councils, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Limited explanation of the level of protective behaviors by knowledge alone","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness of knowledge-based interventions in promoting protective behaviors","Mitigation":"Behavioral psychology interventions, targeted communication strategies, and personalized behavior change programs","Technologies":"Behavioral tracking systems, personalized messaging platforms, and behavior change apps","People":"Public health educators, behavioral scientists, healthcare providers","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions"}]}
